title: Ep60: Battle of Neuve Chapelle 1915
itunes:title: Ep60: Battle of Neuve Chapelle 1915
itunes:subtitle: Pete and Gary tell the story of the Battle of Neuve Chapelle, one of the most important British actions of 1915. This was also the first major action on the Western Front for both Canadian and Indian troops. Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain...
description:
Pete and Gary tell the story of the Battle of Neuve Chapelle, one of the most important British actions of 1915. This was also the first major action on the Western Front for both Canadian and Indian troops.

Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain Publisher: Mat McLachlan Producer: Jess Stebnicki

For more great history content, visit www.LivingHistoryTV.com, or subscribe to our YouTube channel at www.youtube.com/c/LivingHistoryTV

Peter Hart's Military History is a Living History production.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/pete-and-garys-military-history.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
